Articles.Content: Doei anyone know where I can download Kerbpaint for Ksp version 1.0.4?

Despite being from 0.23, it still works:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works%21%29/page55

One Major problem:

Since it is from an older version, is it not capable of coloring the parts released after the "Beta than Ever!"-Update, this is very annoying, since I use a lot of items from later versions.

So there is no updated version?

Edited September 29, 2015 by Vaspox
earlier irrelevant content
